nodes.text: Ross was a clothing retailer on the planet Coruscant. The company operated several stores around Galactic City. The storefront showed the company's name in Aurebesh symbols, while the façade was decorated with a luminous sign that read "hot". At least one of the shops featured additional signage, which showed a woman in a dress/coat. Sometimes, the Ross shops would sell their goods at a lower price than usual, whereupon a luminous "sale" sign would be put up, in order to attract customers.
